ns0:Resource.title: VVV DR4 - VISTA Variables in the Via Lactea survey

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

creator.name: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: Infrared, survey, Milky Way, bulge
content.description: The VVV survey will perform wide FOV multi-epoch observations of the Galaxy's bulge and part of the disk, providing the astronomical public community with a high resolution 3-D (or 4-D if you include the time dimension) map of the bulge.

capability.description: Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.

table.name: vvvSource
table.description: Contains merged sources from detections in vvvDetection

column.name: sourceID
column.description: UID (unique over entire VSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: frameSetID
column.description: UID of the set of frames that this merged source comes from

column.name: ra
column.description: Celestial Right Ascension

column.name: dec
column.description: Celestial Declination
